</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> RTD </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>



</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add virtual custom weight to a helicopter's center of gravity. This can be used to simulate added internal payload for specific scenarios, and affects the flight model.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature AFM</title></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> helicopterRTD '''setCustomWeightRTD''' weight</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> helicopterRTD : [[ObjectRTD]] - helicopter </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> weight: [[Number]] - weight (kilograms) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myHelicopterRTD [[setCustomWeightRTD]] 120;</code> </value></part><part><name/>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[weightRTD]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
